text:
@jkenney @ABDanielleSmith The fact that you think it’s a good idea to share this manure says all it needs to say. Sweden admitted their approach to COVID-19 failed. 

You don’t care about Albertans. Just admit it and it’ll all feel better. #abed #abpoli
